6738.quoteText:
Do Not Track Policy

We do not allow tracking cookies and we do not allow third parties to collect any personal information on our website.
6738.title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you

6739.quoteText: You may not use MeWe’s services for the purpose of spamming anyone. Spam is generally defined on MeWe as bulk or aggressive activity that attempts to manipulate or disrupt MeWe or the experience of users on MeWe to drive traffic or attention to unrelated accounts, products, services, or initiatives.
6739.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

tosdr.case: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

6740.quoteText:
At any time you can retrieve your entire Content Data package from MeWe, using the “Download Your Content” feature in your account. When you select this feature, you will be able to download your Content Data to your personal device and decide how to migrate that data anywhere you choose.

Deleting Your Account - Right to Erasure

At all times you have an easy way to opt out of our service and delete your account as well as ALL of your Content Data, if you do not wish to continue using our services.
6740.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

6741.quoteText: We either delete Log Data or remove any common account identifiers, such as your username, full IP address, or email address, after a maximum of 12 months.
6741.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
